patthana14.17:1.1_0: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.17:2.1_0: Āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.17:3.1_0: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
